verses.name: Judges 11:26
verses.text: While Israel dwelt in Heshbon and her towns, and in Aroer and her towns, and in all the cities that be along by the coasts of Arnon, three hundred years? why therefore did ye not recover them within that time?

verses.name: Judges 11:27
verses.text: Wherefore I have not sinned against thee, but thou doest me wrong to war against me: the Lord the Judge be judge this day between the children of Israel and the children of Ammon.

verses.name: Judges 11:28
verses.text: Howbeit the king of the children of Ammon hearkened not unto the words of Jephthah which he sent him.
